methods.javadoc:
Gets the actual decompiler (may be null if not initialized).
@return the decompiler
methods.name: getDecompiler
methods.comment: Gets the actual decompiler (may be null if not initialized).

methods.name: decompile
methods.comment:
Decompiles the specified function and returns a
 string containing the decompilation.
 This call does not impose a timeout.

methods.name: decompile
methods.comment:
Decompiles the specified function and returns a
 string containing the decompilation.

params.name: timeoutSecs
params.comment: maximum time allowed for decompile to complete.

methods.javadoc: Disposes of the decompiler resources by calling currentDecompiler.dispose().
methods.name: dispose
methods.comment: Disposes of the decompiler resources by calling currentDecompiler.dispose().
